snippet.title: Dying Light: Bad Blood - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get competitive and get the blood on your hands in the all-new brutal royale experience. Available now in Steam Early Access.

Buy now: http://bit.ly/BadBlood_Steam

It’s all in, one out in Dying Light: Bad Blood - a fast-paced and gory online game that creatively blends PvP and PvE combat while retaining the core of Dying Light’s iconic gameplay.

#DLBadBlood #BrutalRoyale

Subscribe for all the latest DL: Bad Blood videos: http://bit.ly/BadBlood_subscription

Follow us: 
Web: http://dlbb.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dlbadblood
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/dlbadblood
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dyinglightgame
